submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        X = []
        oneChg = []
        cnt = Counter()
        n = len(nums)
        for i in range(n // 2):
            tmn = min(nums[i], nums[n - i - 1])
            tmx = max(nums[i], nums[n - i - 1])
            oneChg.append(max(tmx, k - tmn))
            x = abs(nums[i] - nums[n - i - 1])
            X.append(x)
            cnt[x] += 1
            
        ans = inf
        oneChg.sort()
        X.sort()
        n = len(oneChg)
        for x in X:
            i = bisect_left(oneChg, x)
            ans = min(ans, 2 * i - cnt[x] + n - i)
            # print(x, i, n - i - 1, cnt[x])
            
        
        return ans
